Articles.Content:
Hello!

I've been playing KSP for three months now, but I'm still quite a noob, I've never been beyond Minmus

IRL I'm totally not a physicist or a "space scientist", but I love everything space related since I was a little boy. Now I'm a musician, a composition student, and I plan to write a piece of music for every celestial body orbiting Kerbol!

I hope to spend a good time here with you all, bye!

And please correct me if I make mistakes in my writing^^

Ciao, your English is perfect*, well done.

You inspired me to play The Planets Suite, I look forward to hearing yours :-)

I don't know if we've have a thread on what titles each KSP planet should have, perhaps:

  • Moho - The sun-baked
  • Eve - The eater of ships (in case you don't know yet, it's very hard to re-orbit from)
  • Duna - The friendly neighbour
  • Dres - The forgotten
  • Jool - The paternal
  • Eeloo - The distant

[*except "I have loved" instead of "I love"]

Hi Rufus ! As Pecan said, your English is perfect !

So you're Italian ! Do you know the Language Patches project ?

It allows you to translate (a part) of the game in a language (at the moment: FR, IT, ES, DE, PL, PT-BR, ZH (and CS soon))

So you can download it ! It's not updated for KSP v0.25, but it's still functional.

Also, if you've time to spend, you can help us here !

If you need help, I know the KerbalItalia YouTube channel, you'll certainly find help there (maybe you know it)

Benvenuto! -Da un italiano

(Welcome! From an italian"

Thanks for the welcome!

I like your suggestion about the planet's titles, Pecan, I really like them! (and thanks for the correction^^)

And I don't have any problem with the game being in English, but if you need a hand with the translation I can help. And of course I know KerbalItalia, they're really good xD
